entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of snow beginning near noon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 February 2023
